project.name: Stable-profile
project.description: Maintenance of the profile of packages the PPC team calls 'stable'.
project.longdescription: The transition from tested to stable meta-date is this team's responsability. If you want to have something listed as stable or report a bug for a stable package, these people are the ones to contact. If you have ambitions to become a Gentoo developer, this might be the ideal place to start.

task.name: masking
task.longdescription: To be more comfortable to users, tested ebuilds on PPC should be masked stable after some time running without problems. This is a progress in work and will never stop.

milestone.description: Stable masking of ebuilds on PPC
